sentence.Network_en: A new study proved conclusively that smokers die younger than non-smokers.
sentence.Network_cn: 一项新的研究确证了吸烟者比不吸烟者死得早。

sentence.Network_en: All this proves conclusively that she couldn't have known the truth.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一切无可置疑地证明她不可能知道真相.

sentence.Network_en: The problem was finally, though not conclusively, identified as a severely pinched nerve.
sentence.Network_cn: 问题终于被认定为是神经受到严重挤压，尽管这还不是最终结论。

entry.tran: 确定的;毫无疑问的;不容置疑的
entry.def: Conclusive evidence shows that something is certainly true.

example.ex: Her attorneys claim there is no conclusive evidence that any murders took place...
example.tran: 她的律师声称并无确凿证据表明发生了谋杀。

example.ex: Research on the matter is far from conclusive.
example.tran: 对这一问题的研究还远远没有定论。

auth_sentence.content: Not one shred of evidence to conclusively establish evolution.
auth_sentence.res_content: Not one shred of evidence to conclusively establish evolution.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Not one shred of evidence to conclusively establish evolution.

auth_sentence.content: Which does nothing to conclusively establishes the evolutionary continuum.
auth_sentence.res_content: Which does nothing to conclusively establishes the evolutionary continuum.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Which does nothing to conclusively establishes the evolutionary continuum.

auth_sentence.content: Do we have the data to prove this conclusively?
auth_sentence.res_content: Do we have the data to prove this conclusively?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Do we have the data to prove this conclusively?

sentences.en: All this proves conclusively that she couldn’t have known the truth.
sentences.cn: 这一切无可置疑地证明她不可能知道真相。

sentences.en: From the facts,he was able to determine conclusively that the death was not a suicide.
sentences.cn: 根据这些事实他断定这起死亡事件并非自杀。
